mapper.select: select * from tb_admin where email=#{email} and password = #{password}

select id, name, gender, email, telephone, introduction, portrait_path from tb_admin
AND name LIKE concat(concat('%', #{name}), '%')
mapper.insert: insert into tb_admin(id, name, gender, password, email, telephone, introduction, protrait_path) values(#{id}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{password}, #{email}, #{telephone},#{introduction}, #{protrait_path})
